Barb_Swipe.display_help: You shred a single target with a spine emerging from your arm. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Barb_Swipe.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Barb_Swipe.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Lunge.display_help: You lunge forward, stabbing and poisoning a foe with the large spine on your arm. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Lunge.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Lunge.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Spine_Burst.display_help: You fling dozens of spines in a sphere around yourself, hitting multiple nearby targets. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Spine_Burst.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Spine_Burst.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Impale.display_help: You throw a single large spine at a targeted foe. The affected target suffers lethal damage and is poisoned. The force of the spine's impact will also bring flying targets to the ground. The poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Impale.display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), -Fly(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Impale.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Ripper.display_help: You unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc in front of you. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Ripper.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Ripper.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Throw_Spines.display_help: You throw dozens of spines in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the range. Affected targets suffer lethal damage and are poisoned. This poison slows an affected target's movement and attack speeds. It may also cause immobilization and additional toxic damage over time.
Throw_Spines.display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), High DMG (Lethal), -Speed(Foe,All), -Rech(Foe), Chance for Minor DoT (Toxic), Immobilize (Foe)
Throw_Spines.display_target_help: You have been poisoned and suffer reduced movement and attack speeds. You may also suffer immobilization and toxic damage over time.

Coruscating_Armor.display_help: You are encased in a field of coruscating energy that provides resistance to all forms of damage except psionic and toxic.
Coruscating_Armor.display_short_help: Auto (Self), +RES(Smashing, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy)

Lightning_Field.display_help: You emit a continuous field of electricity with deals energy damage to and drains the endurance of any foes caught within the field of effect.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You are suffering energy damage and endurance loss.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Electric_Fence.display_help: You surrounds a target in an Electric Fence, immobilizing them and dealing energy damage over time. This attack also drains endurance from your target and may reduce their recovery rate.
Electric_Fence.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Energy), -End (Foe), Immobilize (Foe), Chance for -Rec(Foe)
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized and suffering energy damage over time. You are also experiencing endurance loss. Your recovery may also be reduced.
